title.rendered: Day 1 – Giannina Azar – Miami Swim Week 2021 Powered by Art Hearts Fashion

content.rendered:
Miami Swim Week Powered by Art Hearts Fashion Day 1. 

24Fashion TV Exclusive:

Giannina Azar

Day One of Swim Week brought surprises in the form of Giannina Azar's amazing hand work, some involving stones, shells, and metals, and all done in bright and vibrant colors.

Miss Colombia 2018 Valeria Morales walks for Giannina Azar

Model Michell Roxana walks for Giannina Azar

Ms International World 2019/2020 Gelsiniy Bareeva

Miss Costa Rica 2014 Karina Ramos walks for Giannina Azar

Fashion model DJ Smith walks for Giannina Azar

Miss Universe El Salvador 2020 Vanessa Velasquez walks for Giannina Azar

Model Tania Victoria Parra walks for Giannina Azar

Model Georgina Mazzeo walks for Giannina Azar

Fashion model Barbara Castellanos walks for Giannina Azar


Photo by Natalie Svors. Exclusively for 24Fashion TV
